answers.answer: Has Crohn's disease been ruled out?
i also have pain across my lower back and aching in my lower legs
Has Crohn's been ruled out?Any labwork recently?  i.e. iron, red blood cell count, etc.In my opinion, this is GI in nature.

nothings been ruled out just yet , i am seeing a dr on wednesday , it takes  a week to see a doctor here, i had a blood test 4 months ago which showed anaemia which i an taking pills for , but thats it at the moment,i just woke up with a really bad headache
Talk with this physician wednesday about seeing a Gastroenterologist would be my recommendation.The pain in your lower back, aching legs and headache are probably related to the anemia.
Look at what you are putting in your mouth in the meantime....what is your diet?
The last question from peanuts is for you, not me.
i dont have any kind of diet , i eat what i want to ,but i am not over weight

hi , i the doctors today , i gave him a list of what the matter was, he thinks diabetes , i dont, i am having bloods done on friday , just to find out , he says if it isn,t that he will look further into it , i hate feeling like this , but until we find out , i will have to put up with the pain
Diabetes?  I think he is TOTALLY off the mark.  What was your fasting blood sugar?What is he basing the diagnosis of Diabetes on?

question: hi ,im a 50 yr old female  i have so many symptoms , i cannot seem to marry them together , i wondered if anyone can... i have loose stools covered in mucus , occasional bleeding but for the last 25yrs ive had constipation which the doctor gave me suppository,s for , i think i over used them at times. i also have excess smelly gas , i have a heaviness under my left rib , i have what feels like lump in my throat which constricts like i have something stuck in my throat and excess burping , with a lot of dry skin on my body , anybody know what it could be ....
title: please help ...i,m confused
